basics.name: Bryan Veloso
basics.label: Entrepreneur, Hobbyist & Content Creator
basics.summary: Versatile professional with 20 years of experience in web design, product development, and content creation at companies including Facebook, GitHub, Twitch, and VShojo. Self-taught in both design and development with a focus on human-centered approaches. I combine technical UI/UX expertise with content creator experience to build engaging products and foster authentic communities through transparent, empathetic leadership.

highlights: Ensured brand consistency and enrichment among artists and merchandise partners
Collaborated with vendors to create a unique meet-and-greet experience for virtual talent
Supervised direct reports to ensure meeting of artistic requests from talent
Empowered direct reports to focus on projects that generated joy and excitement.
Developed a streaming service mindful of creators' mental health throughout the creative experience.
Handled daily operations, managing a multidisciplinary team of nine, with skills ranging from user research to backend engineering.
Employed business expertise to take on all administrative roles, including company formation, fundraising, hiring, payroll, benefits, and so forth.
Handled the company's social media presence, fostering community and creating excitement for the product.
Fostered relationships with industry representatives to become to go-to outlet for user interface-related media coverage.
Founded and managed numerous cross-talent projects ranging from stream teams to multi-community tournaments.
Created and became intimately familiar with designing and coding of overlay systems.
Led the design of the company's chat and social experiences, including Whispers and Friends products.
Initiated and designed highly-requested end-user features, including Chat's Emoticon Selector and Theater Mode.
Leveraged my role to advocate for and ensure that the needs and frustrations of fellow content creators were being addressed in product development.
